General.Name: Xuzhou Handler Special Vehicle Co Ltd
General.Description: Xuzhou Handler Special Vehicle Co., Ltd engages in research, development, production, and sales of aerial work vehicles, electric emergency support vehicles, military products, and fire trucks. It offers vehicle mounted mobile elevated work platform, electric power support vehicles, and fire robots. The company was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Xuzhou, China.
General.Address: No. 19, Baolian Temple Road, Xuzhou, China, 221004
